item.title: R Syntax in a Nutshell Part I
item.description: Seeking help Object types Numeric Vectors Character Vectors Arrays, Matrices, Data Frames Indexing/subsetting of Vectors, Arrays and Data Frames Lists Factors Seeking help First step in doing any programming is to know where to seek help. Here demonstrate how to seek help in R programming. These keywords include: help(), ?, apropos and example. help(plot) ?plot apropos("plot") #Commands related to "plot" ## [1] "assocplot" "barplot" "barplot.default" ## [4] "biplot" "boxplot" "boxplot.
